mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.io.RequiredMappingException
mdException.label: Required attribute mapping exception
mdException.description: Thrown when trying to import location data without mapping the required attributes
mdException.message: The attribute [{attributeLabel}] must be mapped to a source column

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.io.AmbiguousParentException
mdException.label: Ambiguous Parent exception
mdException.description: Thrown when trying to import a geo object with multiple parents of the same name
mdException.message: Multiple parent locations exist for the name [{parentLabel}] and within [{context}]

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.io.TermValueException
mdException.label: Ambiguous Parent exception
mdException.description: Thrown when trying to import a geo object with multiple parents of the same name
mdException.message: The term code [{code}] does not correspond to a known term for attribute [{attributeLabel}]
